required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Kinetic Tremor in Parkinsons Disease: Its Course Under Pramipexole (Mirapexin®) Treatment and Impact on Quality of Life
clinical_study.official_title: Kinetic Tremor in Parkinsons Disease: Its Course Under Pramipexole (Mirapexin®) Treatment and Impact on Quality of Life

brief_summary.textblock: The study will compare the effect of pramipexole on different types of tremor and particularly kinetic tremor in early and advanced Parkinson's disease patients and will evaluate the course of tremor measured with spiralometry under pramipexole treatment.

primary_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale (UPDRS) Part II Score at the End of Maintenance
primary_outcome.description: Change (reduction) in UPDRS Part II score (activities of daily living) from baseline to end of study. Score ranging from 0 - 52 (0=no disability, 52=maximum disability)

primary_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline in UPDRS Part III Score at the End of Maintenance
primary_outcome.description: Change (reduction) in UPDRS Part III score (motor function) from baseline to end of study. Score ranging from 0 - 108 (0=no disability, 108=maximum disability)

primary_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Spiralometry Measurement at the End of Maintenance (Right Hand)
primary_outcome.description: Change (reduction) in tremor amplitude from baseline to end of study for the right hand

primary_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Spiralometry Measurement at the End of Maintenance (Left Hand)
primary_outcome.description: Change (reduction) in tremor amplitude from baseline to end of study for the left hand

primary_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Tremor Score From UPDRS (Items 16, 20, 21) at the End of Maintenance (Visit 3)
primary_outcome.description: Change (reduction)in tremor score from baseline to end of study. Score ranging from 0 - 32 (0=no tremor, 32=high tremor)

primary_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline in 39 Item Parkinson's Disease Questionnaire (PDQ-39) Score at the End of Maintenance
primary_outcome.description: Change (reduction) in PDQ-39 score (quality of life) from baseline to end of study. Score ranging from 0-100 (0=perfect health, 100=worst health as assessed by the measure)

secondary_outcome.description: Final Mirapexin® dose distribution at the end of study

secondary_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline in UPDRS Part II Score at the End of Up-titration
secondary_outcome.description: Change (reduction) in UPDRS Part II score (activities of daily living) from baseline to Visit 2. Score ranging from 0 - 52 (0=no disability, 52=maximum disability)

secondary_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline in UPDRS Part III Score at the End of Up-titration
secondary_outcome.description: Change (reduction) in UPDRS Part III score (motor function) from baseline to Visit 2. Score ranging from 0 - 108 (0=no disability, 108=maximum disability)

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in Tremor Score (UPDRS Items 16, 20, 21) at the End of Up-titration
secondary_outcome.description: Change (reduction) from baseline in tremor score, derived from UPDRS from baseline to Visit 2. Score ranging from 0 - 32 (0=no tremor, 32=high tremor)

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence, Relationship and Seriousness of Adverse Events
secondary_outcome.description: Total number of adverse events (AEs), causality and level of seriousness
Number of patients discontinuing the study prematurely

arm_group.description: Early and advanced Parkinson's disease patients

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Idiopathic Parkinson's disease with or without fluctuations
2. Indication for treatment with pramipexole (Mirapexin®)
3. Presence of at least mild tremor symptoms (as judged by the treating physician)
Exclusion Criteria:
1. Any contraindications according to the Summary of Product Characteristics (SPC): hypersensitivity to pramipexole or to any of the excipients.
2. Ongoing treatment with pramipexole (Mirapexin®)

participant_flow.pre_assignment_details: enrolled in study: 1703 treated (received Mirapexin): 1699 (i.e. 4 patients no record of receiving treatment) completed study: 1599 (i.e. 100 discontinued prematurely)

group.title: Mirapexin® (Pramipexole)
group.description: Mirapexin® (Pramipexole) - tablets for oral use. The dose of Mirapexin® was selected by the treating physician upon his/her clinical judgement and on individual patient need, according to recommendations given in the Mirapexin® Summary of Product Characteristics.

baseline.population: Treated set (TS) (31 patients were missing age and 17 patients were missing gender)

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: Any publication of the result of this trial must be consistent with the Boehringer Ingelheim publication policy. The rights of the investigator and of the sponsor with regard to publication of the results of this trial are described in the investigator contract
